duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage the Customer Success Renewal Quoting Team to ensure on-time renewals and compliance with company policies.
Provide guidance and support to the team in quote creation, revision, and process improvement.
Establish relationships with adjacent functions and drive process effectiveness to reduce time spent on renewal tasks.
Ensure achievement of on-time, accurate, and actionable renewal quote creation and revisions.
Manage renewal pricing and ensure compliance with current policies and procedures.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities.
Drive continual improvement of quoting processes and tools.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree, or 5+ years' experience in an Operations, Product, or Specialists role within a B2B organization
